attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like good manners and etiquet to be taught within the national curriculum, I think that this would make a whole new generation of polite people therefore limiting crime and anti-social behaviour. Therefore you could make my original application law! and make it an offence to be rude.

rejection.details: Please change the main sentence "Catherine Herbert" to an action for HM Government.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
